numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed that there are many more players of color than coaches of color.

3. Players age out of the sport.
4. Coaches can remain in a coaching position for many years.
5. I wonder what the average time is that a coach stays with a team.

16. This shows how much our country has changed.
